content: this legal text summarizes a case involving multiple parties and the division of property the parties are referred to by initials the text describes the different units in a building in osimo italy including apartments on the ground and first floors with courtyards and pergolas the cadastral income and values of each unit are specified the text states that the coownership among the parties has ended and three shares of the property are allocated to each party the specific units and their values are outlined for each party the total settlement amount is mentioned which is to be paid by mr mv and mrs ta to mrs ma md the text concludes with the details of the notary and the date of the document
